```scss
// Property: gravity
// Description: Determines the location at which the notification should appear on the screen.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.Notification
'.gravity-axis-clip': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_AXIS_CLIP }
'.gravity-axis-pull-after': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_AXIS_PULL_AFTER }
'.gravity-axis-pull-before': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_AXIS_PULL_BEFORE }
'.gravity-axis-specified': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_AXIS_SPECIFIED }
'.gravity-axis-x-shift': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_AXIS_X_SHIFT }
'.gravity-axis-y-shift': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_AXIS_Y_SHIFT }
'.gravity-bottom': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_BOTTOM }
'.gravity-center': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_CENTER }
'.gravity-center-horizontal': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_CENTER_HORIZONTAL }
'.gravity-center-vertical': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_CENTER_VERTICAL }
'.gravity-clip-horizontal': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_CLIP_HORIZONTAL }
'.gravity-clip-vertical': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_CLIP_VERTICAL }
'.gravity-display-clip-horizontal': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_DISPLAY_CLIP_HORIZONTAL }
'.gravity-display-clip-vertical': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_DISPLAY_CLIP_VERTICAL }
'.gravity-end': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_END }
'.gravity-fill': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_FILL }
'.gravity-fill-horizontal': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_FILL_HORIZONTAL }
'.gravity-fill-vertical': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_FILL_VERTICAL }
'.gravity-horizontal-mask': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_HORIZONTAL_GRAVITY_MASK }
'.gravity-left': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_LEFT }
'.gravity-no': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_NO_GRAVITY }
'.gravity-relative-horizontal-mask': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_RELATIVE_HORIZONTAL_GRAVITY_MASK }
'.gravity-relative-direction': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_RELATIVE_LAYOUT_DIRECTION }
'.gravity-right': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_RIGHT }
'.gravity-start': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_START }
'.gravity-top': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_TOP }
'.gravity-vertical-mask': { gravity: Ti.UI.Android.GRAVITY_VERTICAL_GRAVITY_MASK }
```
